entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -33.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -33.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -37.8°C
Wind: SSW 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
